properties.name: quickfixj.config
properties.description: The location of the configuration file to use to initialize QuickFixJ client.

properties.name: quickfixj.jmx-enabled
properties.description: Whether to register the Jmx MBeans for the client.

properties.name: quickfixj.startup.timeout
properties.description:
Timeout to wait during spring-context startup, until the sessions have been created (for acceptor connection), or connected (for initiator connection).
If session has not been established, spring startup fails.
